title: Slate's Spoiler Specials: Fur
description:
Slate's Dana Stevens and Mia Fineman discuss Fur: An Imaginary Portrait of Diane Arbus, starring Nicole Kidman and Robert Downey Jr. WARNING: This podcast is meant to be heard AFTER you've seen the movie.
